dcterms:creator: S. Moon
P. Shah
A. Kumar
R. Subba
dcterms:description: OpenDialKG is an open-ended dialog dataset that includes two different tasks: recommendation and chit-chat. The dataset contains human-to-human role-playing dialogs and is used for evaluating conversational recommender systems.
dcterms:title: OpenDialKG

dcterms:creator: R. Li
S. Ebrahimi Kahou
H. Schulz
V. Michalski
L. Charlin
C. Pal
dcterms:description: REDIAL is a conversational recommendation dataset collected through Amazon Mechanical Turk, consisting of conversations for recommendations on movies. It includes seeker-recommender pairs and is designed to evaluate conversational recommender systems.
dcterms:title: REDIAL
